phase.name: COW complete data integration and residual audit

source.reference: Mannheim, 'Classical Underpinnings of Gravitationally Induced Quantum Interference' (arXiv:gr-qc/9611037)
source.formula: Δφ = - m g H^2 / (ħ v0) (square interferometer; lowest order in g)

config.model_note: Didactic orientation proxy: scale by sinθ.

notes: This initial freeze includes a relation-level representative point from Mannheim recap.
Primary experiment tables should be added to upgrade residual audit from initial to full.
This script focuses on reproducing the scaling and magnitude of the COW phase shift.
Step 7.16.11 adds frozen integration I/F (catalog + H-v sweep + residual-audit plumbing).
Raw per-run fringe-shift tables are required to complete a fully observed residual audit.
